body_html:
ubgpu@ubgpu:~/github/tensorflow$ echo $PYTHONPATH

ubgpu@ubgpu:/github/tensorflow$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer
Fatal Python error: Py_Initialize: Unable to get the locale encoding
ImportError: No module named 'encodings'
Aborted (core dumped)
ubgpu@ubgpu:/github/tensorflow$
